text.title: Secure Transmission for Buffer-Aided Relay Networks in the Internet of Things
text.author: Chen Wei, Wendong Yang, Yueming Cai
text.head: 3. Transmission Schemes
text.p: In this section, a conventional non-jamming scheme and two source cooperative jamming schemes are presented for the considered buffer-aided relay IoT networks.
